snippet: Birth photography is a small but growing profession chronicling a rite of passage no less significant than a wedding, though trickier to capture on film.
abstract: Birth photography is a growing profession, increasing in popularity as more couples embrace delivery as a rite of passage worth celebrating and memorializing; profession is attended by a number of specific difficulties, including photography bans in some delivery rooms.
lead_paragraph: Birth photography is a small but growing profession chronicling a rite of passage no less significant than a wedding, though trickier to capture on film.

headline.seo: Now in the Delivery Room: Forceps! Camera! Action!
headline.main: Honey, the Baby Is Coming; Quick, Call the Photographer
headline.print_headline: Honey, the Baby Is Coming; Quick, Call the Photographer

keywords.value: International Assn of Professional Birth Photographers
keywords.name: organizations
